actions.committee: Senate Committee on Banking, Housing and Urban Affairs
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Banking, Housing and Urban Affairs.

committees.committee: Senate Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs

official_title: A bill to extend the moratorium on conversions of insured savings and loan associations.

summary.text: Savings and Loan Conversion Act - Amends the National Housing Act to authorize the completion of an experiment authorized by Congress in 1974 to study the conversion of mutual savings and loan associations to the stock form of ownership, but extends the moratorium on any other conversions.

titles.title: A bill to extend the moratorium on conversions of insured savings and loan associations.
